Source: Combination of WSC and enhanced Winograd Schema Challenge dataset from the paper The Sensitivity of Language Models and Humans to Winograd Schema Perturbations
Definition:
In this task, you will be given a sentence or two along with a change aspect. You should change the given text in the given aspect. Aspects are explained below:
 Tense: Change the tense of the verbs in the text. If they're in past tense, change them to present, and if they're in present tense, change them to past tense.
Number: Change the number of the nouns in the given text. Make plurals into singles and single into plurals. Remember to change the corresponding pronouns accordingly.
Voice: If the verbs are in active voice, change them to be passive, otherwise, change them to be in active voice.
Adverb: add one or multiple adverbs to the text.
Gender: If the text contains female names and pronouns, substitute them with male names and pronouns. Do the same for sentences with mala names and pronouns.#TheVerbs #Gender #TheText #YouTheyTheyVerbsText #TheGivenAspect #TheNumber #Number #MalaNames #Aspects #OneOrMultipleAdverbs #TheTense #Plurals #AChangeAspect #Sentences #ThisTask #TheCorrespondingPronouns #SentenceTextTenseThemNumberPluralsAdverbsThemSame #ActiveVoice #Pronouns #Voice #Them #FemaleNames #MaleNames #TheGivenText #Do #ASentence #TheNouns #Singles
